sections.heading: Stay Informed
sections.paragraph: All new announcements, code and hardware updates are posted on our Discord server. New releases are obviously also released on our GitHub. For smaller anouncements, updates and milestones check out our Instagram. Finally, you can subscribe to our mailing list where we will send out updates regarding product releases.

sections.heading: Join the Conversation
sections.paragraph: Our main platform for conversation, feedback etc. is our Discord server. If you have interesting ideas, feedback, bugfixes or just want to talk about rockets and flight electronics join our server!

sections.heading: Contributing
sections.paragraph: Do you want to contribute to our project? Hit us up on info@catsystems.io and let us know your ideas! We would be proud to have more people implementing new features in our project or telling us about bugs and improvements!
